root.name: Backyard Hockey 2005
root.description: Features 2004-05 NHL Licensed TeamsCustom Players - create players who can improve with experienceThree Ways to Play - Play Now Mode, Single Games and Season PlayAir Hockey Mini Game - take on the computer in this arcade game. NHL Players Featured In Game Forwards:Joe Thornton, Boston BruinsMats Sundin, Toronto Maple LeafsMarion Gaborik, Minnesota WildJaromir Jagr, New York RangersIlya Kovalchuk, Atlanta ThrashersMike Modano, Dallas StarsRick Nash, Columbus Blue Jackets Defensemen: Nicklas Lindstrom, Detroit Red Wings Goalies:Martin Brodeur, New Jersey DevilsRoman Cechmanek, Los Angeles Kings Recommended System Requirements OS: Windows® 98/Me/2000/XP CPU: Intel Pentium® III 800 MHz RAM: 256 MBVideo: DirectX 9.0 CompatibleVideoRAM: 32 MBSound: DirectX 9.0 CompatibleHard Drive Space: 600MBDisk: 8X CD-RomDirect X: DirectX Version 9.0 (included)
